channel.title: Cached Query Results
channel.description:
### Issue Summary
Hi
Is there a way to disable cached query results from the api (like a parameter to add to the url) ? sometimes when making a call it returns the old dataset back
### Technical details:
* Redash Version: 8.00 * Browser/OS:Ubuntu * How did you install Redash:Docker

item.title: Cached Query Results
item.dc:creator: jesse
item.description:
Yes. Just include max_age: 0 in your request JSON.

For reference: https://redash.io/help/user-guide/integrations-and-api/api

Read full topic
